00020 void task2(void *args);
00021 void led_on();
00022 void led_blink(void *raw_args)
00023 {
00024     struct task_args *args = (struct task_args *) raw_args;
00025 
00026     while (1) {
00027         os_task_sleep(os_task_get_current(), &event);
00028         gpio_tgl_gpio_pin(args->pin);
00029         os_task_delay(OS_MS_TO_TICK(args->delay_ms));
00030         //os_semaphore_release(&sem);
00031         os_mutex_unlock(&mutex);
00032     }
00033 }
00034 
00035 void task2(void *args)
00036 {
00037     volatile static uint32_t task_switch;
00038     volatile static uint32_t jitter;
00039     while (1) {
00040         gpio_tgl_gpio_pin(LED3_GPIO);
00041         os_task_delay(OS_MS_TO_TICK(500));
00042         task_switch = os_statistics_get_task_switch_time();
00043         jitter = os_statistics_get_task_switch_time_jitter();
00044     }
00045 }
00046 
00047 void led_on()
00048 {
00049     gpio_clr_gpio_pin(LED3_GPIO);
00050 }

00066     struct task_args args_4 = {

00069     };
00070 
00071     pm_switch_to_osc0(&AVR32_PM, FOSC0, OSC0_STARTUP);
00072

00074     //os_semaphore_create_event(&event, &sem);
00075

00078

00080 
00081     os_task_create(&task_1, led_blink, &args_1, 500, OS_TASK_DEFAULT);
00082     os_task_create(&task_2, led_blink, &args_2, 500, OS_TASK_DEFAULT);
00083     os_task_create(&task_3, led_blink, &args_3, 500, OS_TASK_DEFAULT);
